thread.title: 21 Hilarious Tweets About Books Guaranteed To Make You Laugh

author: Jarry Lee
title: 21 Hilarious Tweets About Books Guaranteed To Make You Laugh
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @faithonwords ID: 10315195 8. If you can tell the difference between Jonathan Safran Foer and McLovin I'll give you a hundred bucks
— Anna Hezel (@HezelAnna) ID: 10314145 9. adult fiction: I am riddled w ennui shall I cheat on my wife perhaps YA fiction: overthrow govt and also kill its grasping maoist successor
— MAX IM A KOOPA (@meakoopa) ID: 10313653 10. wow. never realized.
— Real Chip Zdarsky (@zdarsky) ID: 10313432 11. Cormac McCarthy is alive and well and still doesn't care about Twitter.
— Penguin Random House (@penguinrandom) ID: 10313341 12. I wish jk rowling would potter fewer
— Kevin Nguyen (@knguyen) ID: 10313371 13. Milo’s new book will look odd, with all the words being aligned so far to the right & none of it being justified.
— European Bunny (@tweetyaca) ID: 10313608 14. JON SNOW: i'm dead FANS: hmm... WRITERS: he's dead F: dead... in spirit HBO: rip jon snow. murdered to death F: ah... murdered... for now...
— demi adejuyigbe (@electrolemon) ID: 10313499 15. This is the best description of how I handle my feelings ever
— Tim (@Playing_Dad) ID: 10315779 16. stephen king wrote a children's book under a pseudonym, then blurbed the front cover as himself. hustlers don't sle… https://t.co/a7CpaSMlTA
— popeyes wide shut (@trillotto) ID: 10313623 17. I reverse image-searched this children's book about Trump and this happened.
— Joe Dator (@JoeDator) ID: 10313702 18. I LOVE how this ad for a children's book skewers clichéd crime-thriller novel marketing. And that @nytimes testimon… https://t.co/ZZlmcRsFhG
— Dan Maher (@MrPointyHead) ID: 10313318 19. How to write an existentialist novel: 1. Early 30s white dude is socially isolated and depressed. 2. No real plot. 3. That's pretty much it.
— Existential Comics (@existentialcoms) ID: 10313795 20. View this image ›
Twitter: @PaperWash ID: 10315581 21. Damn Darnielle, back at it again with the wolf in white vans
— Mike Barthel (@michaelbarthel) ID: 10313469
